# Sample phishing email content for testing
# Generated by: Muzan Sano

Subject: URGENT: Your PayPal Account Has Been Limited - Immediate Action Required

Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your PayPal account and have temporarily limited access to protect your financial information.

IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED:
Your account will be permanently suspended within 24 hours unless you verify your identity.

Account Details:
- Account: p***l@example.com  
- Last Login: August 1, 2025 - 3:45 AM (Suspicious Location: Unknown Country)
- Failed Login Attempts: 7
- Status: LIMITED ACCESS

To restore full access to your account, please click the link below and complete the verification process:

VERIFY YOUR ACCOUNT NOW: http://paypal-security-center.bit.ly/verify-account-2025

This secure link will expire in 6 hours for your protection.

If you do not complete this verification immediately:
- Your account will be permanently closed
- All pending transactions will be cancelled  
- Funds may be held for up to 180 days
- You will lose access to PayPal services permanently

For your security, please do not forward this email or share your login credentials with anyone.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.

PayPal Security Team
Customer Protection Services

---
This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.
PayPal Holdings, Inc.

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email contains confidential information intended only for the recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete this message immediately.
